rows.label: qev095201_MSG0001
rows.name:
I won't lieâ€”this mission is a real gamble.
But somebody has to stand up and do it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095201_MSG0002
rows.name: The question is...who?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095201_MSG0003
rows.name:
If we send in someone sloppy or inexperienced,
it's basically a death sentence.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095201_JNK0010
rows.name: Ask about the Mission

rows.label: qev095201_SEL0011
rows.name: Press Julius for more information about the mission.

rows.label: qev095201_JNK0020
rows.name: Ask about Julius

rows.label: qev095201_SEL0021
rows.name: Inquire as to what Julius's role is.

rows.label: qev095201_MSG0004
rows.name:
I've been ordered to find a BLADE who will accept and
complete a high-risk mission.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095201_MSG0005
rows.name: If you're interested, I'll give you the details.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095201_MSG0006
rows.name: I work for BLADE HQ, in communications.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095201_MSG0007
rows.name:
And right now I'm trying to find someone to handle an
especially high-risk mission.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095201_MSG0008
rows.name: It's dangerous work, but it's critical that it gets done.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095201_MSG0009
rows.name:
So as you probably know, the survey of Noctilum is
pretty far along at this point.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095201_MSG0010
rows.name:
And as a result of that, we recently picked up a
strange signal.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095201_MSG0011
rows.name:
It was a bit tough to parse through all the noise,
but it sounds like it might be an SOS coming from
the Suncatch Ravine.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095201_MSG0012
rows.name:
It's similar to a human signal, but not identical.
Almost like it's attempting to mimic one of our own.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095201_JNK0030
rows.name: Support

rows.label: qev095201_SEL0031
rows.name: Say that it is worth checking out.

rows.label: qev095201_JNK0040
rows.name: Caution

rows.label: qev095201_SEL0041
rows.name: Tell Julius that it smells like a trap.

rows.label: qev095201_MSG0013
rows.name: Oh, without a doubt.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095201_MSG0014
rows.name:
And yes, it could be a trap, but it's also possible we'll
find Ganglion deserters there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095201_MSG0015
rows.name: They could have some critical intel.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095201_MSG0016_m
rows.name: Believe me, you're not the first person to think that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095201_MSG0016_f
rows.name: Believe me, you're not the first person to think that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095201_MSG0017
rows.name:
Especially since no BLADEs have gone missing anywhere
near that ravine.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095201_MSG0018
rows.name: Which means it's not a human sending up the signal.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095201_MSG0019
rows.name:
...So what do you think? The potential gains are huge,
but so is the danger.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095201_MSG0020
rows.name:
This mission demands the best of the best,
and I'm thinking that might just be you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095201_MSG0021
rows.name: So will you take it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095201_MSG0022
rows.name: On behalf of BLADE HQ, I appreciate it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095201_MSG0023
rows.name: Good luck. Come back safe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095201_MSG0024
rows.name:
We need you to investigate the SOS coming from
the Suncatch Ravine.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095201_MSG0025
rows.name:
Given the terrain, it may be easier to go in at night
as opposed to the middle of the day.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095201_MSG0026
rows.name: Excellent work![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095201_MSG0027
rows.name:
I don't know what we expected, but it sure wasn't
rescuing xenos from the Ganglion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095201_MSG0028
rows.name: And xenos with advanced tech, no less![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095201_MSG0029
rows.name:
We are rational beings guided and informed by logic.
Our technology far surpasses yours.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095201_MSG0030
rows.name:
We are positive that we shall be of great assistance in
the development of your city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095201_MSG0031
rows.name: We have Director General Chausson's approval.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095201_MSG0032
rows.name:
The xenos can have asylum in exchange for assisting
our survey of Mira, as well as providing any anti-
Ganglion intel they may have.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095201_MSG0033
rows.name: They'll also be forming a new arms manufacturer.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095201_MSG0034
rows.name:
We previously engaged in weapon development for the
Ganglion. Now we shall put that expertise to use for
you humans.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095201_MSG0035
rows.name: In return, you will defend us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095201_MSG0036
rows.name: We scratch their backs, they scratch ours.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095201_MSG0037
rows.name:
Scratching is unnecessary. We will hold to the terms of
our alliance as previously discussed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095201_MSG0038
rows.name:
That rescue mission was a crapshoot, but it paid off.
Thanks for making it such a success.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095201_MSG0039
rows.name: You have the gratitude of the Orphe as well.[ST:wait ]
